page.title: 06Shopping (part 2)
page.content: We wanted to find out what people thought of Abercynon as a shopping centre.We made up two{questionnaires} and asked all the parents of children in the school to answer four questions so that we were able to find out peoples opinions.Most people shop less in the town since the Co-Op has closed and that a new supermarket was needed,but only one of the shopkeepers agreed with.Only four of the shoppers were satisfied with the centre when it came to buying clothes,most of them prefer to use Cardiff or Pontypridd the majority of shoppers said that{ {prices}were to high but almost all of them thought that the{service}they got was good.Younger people with families use their cars to shop once a week in large supermarkets because the prices are more reasonable.
